properties.areaDesc: Lewiston Area; Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 1 at 5:08AM PST until February 1 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph
expected.

* WHERE...Lewiston Area and Lewis and Southern Nez Perce
Counties.

* WHEN...Advisory strength winds are expected through 6 PM PST
Saturday. The strongest winds are expected during the morning
hours.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may
result.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest wind gust potential will
occur over the exposed terrain and higher benches and hills
around the region especially the northeastern Palouse...Alpowa
Summit and Pomeroy areas...the West Plains and the South Hill.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING
